00016 struct EpisodeInfoStruct
00017 {
00018  unsigned long ExeImageSize;
00019  unsigned long OffEgaHead;
00020  unsigned long OffEgaDict;
00021  unsigned long NumChunks;
00022  unsigned int NumFonts, IndexFonts;
00023  unsigned int NumBitmaps, IndexBitmaps;
00024  unsigned int NumMaskedBitmaps, IndexMaskedBitmaps;

00031  unsigned int NumTexts, IndexTexts;
00032  unsigned int NumDemos, IndexDemos;
00033 };
